Address.value: 20 IOULIOU KAISARA STR,19002 ATHENS, PAIANIA, Greece

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Rubico Inc, incorporated in the Republic of the Marshall Islands in August 2022, is an international shipping company focused on owning and operating modern, fuel-efficient Suezmax crude oil tankers. Its primary vessel is the MT Eco Malibu, a Suezmax tanker with a capacity of approximately 157,000 deadweight tons and an average age of just over two years. The company's strategy includes expanding its fleet through acquisitions of newbuild or secondhand vessels, including ships owned by its parent company, to which Rubico has a right of first offer. Headquartered in Maroussi, Athens, Greece, Rubico aims to serve the global crude oil transportation market with a modern and efficient fleet.
